comment: Black (LAL) makes contact with Lopez' (BKN) arm and the contact affects his layup attempt.
Johnson (BKN) affects Kelly's (LAL) RSBQ at the start of his drive.
Lopez (BKN) clamps Hill's (LAL) arm, affecting his ability to retrieve the rebound.
Kelly (LAL) commits a take foul on Brown (BKN).
Clarkson (LAL) commits a take foul on Williams (BKN).
